Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Sofa \So"fa\, n.; pl. {Sofas}. [Ar. soffah, from saffa to dispose in order: cf. F. sofa, It. sof[`a].] A long seat, usually with a cushioned bottom, back, and ends; -- much used as a comfortable piece of furniture. [1913 Webster]
Let fall the curtains, wheel the sofa round. --Cowper. [1913 Webster]
{Sofa bed}, a sofa so contrived that it may be extended to form a bed; -- called also {sofa bedstead}. [1913 Webster]
